:active.description: Whether or not to show an animated effect

avatar.description: Whether to display a placeholder for your avatar

loading.description: 'true', the placeholder map is displayed. Otherwise, the sub-components are displayed directly
loading.description_zh: 为 `true` 时，显示占位图。反之则直接展示子组件

title.description: Whether to display the title placeholder

SkeletonAvatarProps.name: size
SkeletonAvatarProps.description: 设置头像占位图的大小

SkeletonTitleProps.name: width
SkeletonTitleProps.description: 设置标题占位图的宽度

SkeletonParagraphProps.name: rows
SkeletonParagraphProps.description: 设置段落占位图的行数

SkeletonParagraphProps.name: width
SkeletonParagraphProps.description: 设置段落占位图的宽度，若为数组时则为对应的每行宽度，反之则是最后一行的宽度
